Having the good fortune to have traveled to a number of different countries, I've seen the vast differences in wealth (or lack of), and I glad I'm able to help out others who may be less fortunate.

lenders.name: VVD Wageningen
lenders.loan_because: We are the local division of the Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD) in the municipality of Wageningen, The Netherlands, known for its famous agricultural university. Lots of international students from all over the world travel to our town to study here. Therefore we feel also responsible to provide equal opportunities in developing countries. Providing microcredits can be a good solution to do so. For every new member our party gets we save $25 for this purpose via Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Volkspartij voor Vrijheid en Democratie (Party for Freedom and Democracy, VVD) is a political party founded on the liberal philosophy. Its aim is to further the free intellectual and social development of each individual, without making distinctions according to religious or ideological conviction, nationality, sex, race, colour of skin or language. Central to its beliefs is freedom of choice for everyone. With approximately 18% of the voters, the VVD is the third largest political party in the Netherlands.

The VVD believes that the government’s role is important, although not central, and it is not a goal in itself. In other words, the VVD wants everyone to have equal opportunities for development but, at the same time, it believes that those who earn more through hard work and those who develop their talents or take more responsibility upon themselves, should be better rewarded.

The VVD believes that the government’s role is important, although not central, and it is not a goal in itself. In other words, the VVD wants everyone to have equal opportunities for development but, at the same time, it believes that those who earn more through hard work and those who develop their talents or take more responsibility upon themselves, should be better rewarded.

It's also a fantastic way to teach children the importance of sharing, and helping others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Kristin: I help companies and governments build SECURE computer systems, and learn how to safely and securely protect their assets - including their data, buildings, and PEOPLE.
Keenan: I make people smile and laugh pretty much all day and night!

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: When I came to the U.S. I had dreams and plans and a strong desire to succeed. One of the biggest obstacles was to obtain the funding to accomplish my goals. Now that I have the resources I would like to help as many people as possible to obtain their goals and at the same time they can improve their lives and the economy of the people in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I trained as a Chemists and posterior I became a Physician. As a Chemists I found the pleasure to discover and research deep in the secrets of nature. As a Physician I learned the pleasure, happiness and hope I can bring to other people's lives,  and at the same time feel a whole and fulfilled life.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to support small businesses , so they can achieve a better life !!
lenders.occupational_info: i work in telecoms and sell data services to the global carriers

lenders.name: Mark Parsons
lenders.loan_because: we all need to help each other

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: charity is important and it begins with you.
lenders.occupational_info: I test software for a living to make sure that it works correctly.

lenders.name: Dan & Desiree
lenders.loan_because: We've received help in our lives and now have an opportunity to assist others
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired Administrators that worked for the City of Long Beach

lenders.name: Bernadette
lenders.loan_because: I know for a fact that a lot of poor families needs security and financial help.  And I want to help these families especially those who have children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the Postal Office. We sort, case and deliver mail.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make their businesses run more efficiently.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: It's a way I can provide direct help to someone who needs help in a distant place.
lenders.occupational_info: I do the ordinary work of a Catholic Priest.  I celebrate (pray) the Mass with people, visit sick and shut-in people, prepare people to get married, preside over funerals, and manage a parish which also has a school with 180 students.

lenders.name: Laurence
lenders.loan_because: Other people deserve the opportunities I receive naturally.
lenders.occupational_info: Implement computer systems, train staff in its operations and define procedures for accounting & auditing.

lenders.name: Rachel H
lenders.loan_because: We all need help sometimes, especially if we are going to use the help to become self-sufficient or better than we were before...not as a method or  practice of continuously asking for help.  Break the cycle - Pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: Making a positive difference in how or what we are doing.

lenders.name: Jahanara and Wavy
lenders.loan_because: We loan  because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: We work at a summer camp for children, where they can learn to do circus arts like juggling, trapeze and walk on stilts.

lenders.name: MasieroCaldasFamily
lenders.loan_because: Helping others realize their dreams is everything we can expect. We are particularly focused in helping people be free to pursue their business ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: Investors

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: My heart feels warmer and lighter when I try to help someone else. I really like the way Kiva does this.
lenders.occupational_info: I bend hot glass to form letters which are used in signs for other small businesses.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying as an engineer so that I can make clean energy that doesn't hurt the environment and will let our children prosper.

lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.occupational_info: Work with the distribution of products related to Bem-Estar that already are has 28 years in the market and more than possesss 40 million satisfied customers in 65 countries where the company is present.

lenders.name: Edmund
lenders.occupational_info: My company helps to keep homes and business organized, free of clutter, and efficient.

lenders.name: David Floyd Houston
lenders.loan_because: I was born and partially raised in a small Indiana (USA) town known for its poverty and lack of opportunity. Having escaped that poverty and lack of opportunity, I want all people on Earth to have the opportunity to own their own business, improve the quality of their life, and pursue their dreams. And each time I help finance a small business around the world, I am hopefully creating one less terrorist and one less illegal immigrant to the USA, by creating opportunity and goodwill where the people already live.
lenders.occupational_info: I was President & CEO of a company that provided legal services to lawyers and judges in the USA.  I retired in 2004 in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. Our family roots trace back to the village of Houston, Scotland.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has the ability to be successful, sometimes we need a little boost to get there!

lenders.name: Fred & Barb
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do! Individually we may not be able to move a mountain but together, if we each move a wheel barrel of earth, the mountain will get moved.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to reduce the carbon footprint of business by making  distributed renewable wind energy available as a viable economic alternative to fossil fuels.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: God is good!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a library for students in Kindergarten through 8th Grade.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I care about my fellow Human Beings.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in a person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the healthcare industry.

lenders.name: Danial
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Steward and evangelist for delicious bi-valves.

lenders.name: monal
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in any way I can.

lenders.name: monica
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference in my life. Found in these few words are the essential principles of the Art of Giving: Respect, Appreciation, Gratitude and Value. Move sequentially, from one to the other.
lenders.occupational_info: creative.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to let money flow around. If I have a little bit more than I need at the moment, than this money can work for someone else who has less at that time.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a musician (overtone singing, framedrums, string instruments...) and am also working with alternative healing methodes.
I also like to combine this two fields. My new project is called "silence within music":
www.silencewithinmusic.com

Other projects:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f3peZkdJblw
http://www.metamorphische-methode.de
http://www.kennenlernangebot.de
http://www.christianhack.net
http://www.musikmassage.de
http://www.haq.de

lenders.name: Neil Hong
lenders.loan_because: I'm always willing to lend a helping hand to those who need it.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by people improving their lives.

lenders.name: Rodrigo
lenders.loan_because: I work with microcredit in Brazil and I know it works. So I'd like to help somebody overseas too.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: of sisterhood and brotherhood
lenders.occupational_info:
I learn, I teach, I paint, I dance in spirit.
In the past I have been a development worker in India,  a manager, a lecturer, a planner, a consultant.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: This is a great program.  Thanks!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired phone company executive.  Active community volunteer.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I love to!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and try to learn as much as i can to become a better person

lenders.name: LAWRENCE
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior commercial credit analyst for a private bank.  I review business financials and meet with business owners to determine whether or not they are a lendable entity.

lenders.name: Twinky
lenders.loan_because: I have been successful in my life due to the help of others so to honor their faith in me, I want to do my part to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the finances for a small biotech company.

lenders.name: catherine
lenders.loan_because: ITS THE RIGHTEOUS THINK TO DO
lenders.occupational_info: I'M A PCA. A PERSONAL CARE ASSISTANT. I GIVE CARE TO THE ELDERLY IN THEIR HOMES INSTEAD OF A FACILITY.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: It reaffirms that every little bit counts and we should all do what we can to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women in the US start their own children's book businesses.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.occupational_info: I provide after-school programs for second-generation immigrant kids

lenders.name: George
lenders.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lenders.name: NTB
lenders.loan_because: I think they really need it.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple way to help industrious entrepreneurs to build a viable business and life!
lenders.occupational_info: I help college students plan careers and secure employment.

lenders.name: robin
lenders.loan_because: we all need to affect change and this ismy way.
lenders.occupational_info: event management

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I believe it important to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and I want to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software that protects computers.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good way to give responsible people a break without charing them a fortune for the investment. I figure it's a good way to help people to help themselves and eventually help others in a similar position.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and maintain computer systems.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: it will help improve the lives of people less fortunate than me, not only financially, but it will be a boost to their self esteem.
